title: SOL 3pk Modelling Clay 16 Assorted Colours – Soft Clay Kit for Kids – Promotes Creativity & Sensory Play – Ideal for Crafts, School Projects, Anxiety Relief, Gifts, and Party Giveaways
features: Unleash Creativity & Fun – This modelling clay set encourages self-expression, problem-solving skills, and confidence-building in children and teens. A great way to explore creativity through sensory play while making fun and colourful creations.

Soft & Reusable – Our moulding clay stays mouldable and flexible after multiple uses. If it starts to firm up, simply knead the dough, and your hands' natural oils will restore its softness, making it easy to shape and sculpt repeatedly.

Vibrant Colour Selection – This kids' clay modelling kit includes 16 bright colours such as Black, White, Blue, Light Blue, Light Green, Pink, Violet, Red, Grey, Orange, Yellow, and Turquoise, offering endless creative possibilities.

Perfect Gift for Any Occasion – This modelling clay for kids set makes a fun and practical gift for birthdays, Christmas, and party giveaways. It promotes creativity, sensory play, and even helps with anxiety relief, making it great for all ages.

Great for Group Activities – Includes 3 packs of modelling clay, ideal for crafting groups, schools, and kids' parties. Perfect for classroom art projects, DIY crafts, and interactive learning activities.

Our modelling clay encourages creativity, boosts self-confidence, and helps develop problem-solving skills. It allows children to explore self-expression and engage in sensory play, which is both fun and educational. Is this modelling clay safe for kids to use? Yes, it’s made from safe, non-toxic materials, making it suitable for kids. It stays soft and reusable after multiple uses, and if it becomes firm, simply kneading it will bring it back to its original softness. How many colours come in the pack and what are they? Each pack includes 16 colours: black, white, blue, light blue, light green, pink, violet, red, grey, orange, yellow, and turquoise. It provides a wide range of colours to enhance any creative project. Does this modelling clay harden over time? No, this modelling clay is non-hardening and remains flexible even after multiple uses. If it starts to firm up, kneading it with your hands will restore its soft texture for continued use. Is this modelling clay a good gift idea? Absolutely! Our modelling clay set is a practical, fun gift for children and teens, perfect for birthdays, holidays, or party favours. It promotes creativity and sensory play, and can even help relieve anxiety through hands-on activity.
